import numpy as np

def score(item: int, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    """The Modified Logarithmic Score Algorithm calculates the scores as the logarithm of the item size 
    divided by the logarithm of the rest capacity of the bins."""
    
    # Calculate the item size component as the logarithm of the item size
    item_size_component = np.log(item)
    
    # Calculate the rest capacity component as the logarithm of the rest capacity of the bins
    rest_capacity_component = np.log(bins)
    
    # Calculate the scores as the logarithm of the item size component divided by the logarithm of the rest capacity component
    scores = np.log(item_size_component / rest_capacity_component)
    
    return scores
